lyrics:
"Don't Believe Me" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "Don't Believe Me" Drumma Boy Brrr (Hey boy) Big Gucci (Hey) Yo playa (Hey boy) Brrr I got a homie named Frankie (Frankie), last name Mueller And he hang with my panky (Panky), ice cooler And my role you should thank me (Thank me), thank my jeweler 'Cause he got me so icy (Brrr) If another hater try to take my jewelry, I'ma probably have to go and pick a jury I'm goin' M6 karats, can you hear me? I'm so flashy, suckas can't stand near me When I be a granddad, I tell my grandchildren When I was 30 years old, I had 30 million Came a long way from trappin' in a vacant building 60,000 people screaming such a great feelin' (Gucci) Think he all that, he think he all that He think he all that but I don't believe that Gucci Mane wack, Gucci can't rap Gucci ain't trap but you don't believe that I'm tryin' to get fat checks and all that You think you go harder but I don't believe that And you don't believe that Know you from way back You don't believe that and I don't believe that We just don't believe that It is not that easy You gon' have to try harder to deceive me Before I ever started gettin' rap money (Money) I was wrappin' up them things like a mummy (Dummies) Your whole crew like food for my tummy And I'm hungry right now so its ovey I'm the hood MVP with a trophy (A trophy) I got five rings on like I'm Kobe (I'm Kobe) I'm puttin' it down like my good partner Toby (Toby) He in the feds, yeah, them people gave him 40 I'm still ridin' around the city with the .40 (Shawty) I think what the fuck I wanna think just run up on me (On me) Think he all that, he think he all that He think he all that but I don't believe that Gucci Mane wack, Gucci can't rap Gucci ain't trap but you don't believe that I'm tryin' to get fat checks and all that You think you go harder but I don't believe that And you don't believe that Know you from way back You don't believe that and I don't believe that We just don't believe that I just got a text message, should I say a sex message? Say she got an ice fetish, told her get her mouth ready Hydro got my light-headed, Lambo got her sightseein' Not the average human bein' so I'm ridin' in European Paid 'em and I bring 'em in, start out friends and end up fuckin' Please don't ask her once again, they at my hotel goin' in Gucci Mane be goin' in, fuck your throat, go again DJ hit my ho again, tell me what you recommend I put it down, I fly em in, fly 'em out then go again I get around like 2Pac 94' but its 2010 17 Brick Squad Records, I'm a busy man Stay out Gucci business, this ain't where the rings on Gucci hands Think he all that, he think he all that He think he all that but I don't believe that Gucci Mane wack, Gucci can't rap Gucci ain't trap but you don't believe that I'm tryin' to get fat checks and all that You think you go harder but I don't believe that And you don't believe that Know you from way back You don't believe that and I don't believe that We just don't believe that if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('
